text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You’ve been saying H1N1 caused 17k deaths though that number is subject to dispute, there is no doubt however, that Covid-19 has caused more, and in the end, a lot more. Now tell us how much better you did than Obama... https://t.co/Adaxb7uHfF
